001package io.cyborgcode.roa.ui.service.fluent;
002
003import io.cyborgcode.roa.framework.storage.Storage;
004import io.cyborgcode.roa.ui.components.alert.AlertService;
005import io.cyborgcode.roa.ui.selenium.AlertUiElement;
006import io.cyborgcode.roa.ui.selenium.smart.SmartWebDriver;
007import io.qameta.allure.Allure;
008import org.assertj.core.api.Assertions;
009
010import static io.cyborgcode.roa.ui.storage.StorageKeysUi.UI;
011
012/**
013 * Provides fluent API methods for interacting with Alert UI components.
014 *
015 * <p>This class encapsulates interactions with Alert elements, allowing retrieval,
016 * validation, and visibility checks. It integrates with {@link AlertService} to
017 * perform operations in a structured manner.
018 *
019 * <p>The generic type {@code T} represents the main UI service fluent class that this service extends,
020 * allowing method chaining within the fluent API structure.
021 *
022 * @author Cyborg Code Syndicate üíçüë®üíª
023 */
024@SuppressWarnings({"java:S5960", "unchecked"})
025public class AlertServiceFluent<T extends UiServiceFluent<?>> {
026
027   private final AlertService alertService;
028   private final T uiServiceFluent;
029   private final Storage storage;
030   private final SmartWebDriver driver;
031
032   /**
033    * Constructs an instance of {@link AlertServiceFluent}.
034    *
035    * @param uiServiceFluent The main UI service fluent instance.
036    * @param storage         The storage object for maintaining test state.
037    * @param alertService    The service handling alert interactions.
038    * @param webDriver       The instance of {@link SmartWebDriver}.
039    */
040   public AlertServiceFluent(T uiServiceFluent, Storage storage, AlertService alertService,
041                             SmartWebDriver webDriver) {
042      this.alertService = alertService;
043      this.uiServiceFluent = uiServiceFluent;
044      this.storage = storage;
045      this.driver = webDriver;
046   }
047
048   /**
049    * Retrieves the value of the specified alert element.
050    *
051    * @param element The alert UI element.
052    * @return The current fluent service instance for method chaining.
053    */
054   public T getValue(final AlertUiElement element) {
055      Allure.step(String.format("[UI - Alert] Retrieving value for alert with componentType: %s, locator: %s",
056            element.componentType(), element.locator()));
057      element.before().accept(driver);
058      String value = alertService.getValue(element.componentType(), element.locator());
059      element.after().accept(driver);
060      storage.sub(UI).put(element.enumImpl(), value);
061      return uiServiceFluent;
062   }
063
064   /**
065    * Validates that the alert element's value matches the expected value.
066    *
067    * @param element       The alert UI element.
068    * @param expectedValue The expected value of the alert.
069    * @return The current fluent service instance for method chaining.
070    */
071   public T validateValue(final AlertUiElement element, String expectedValue) {
072      return validateValue(element, expectedValue, false);
073   }
074
075   /**
076    * Validates that the alert element's value matches the expected value with an option for soft assertions.
077    *
078    * @param element       The alert UI element.
079    * @param expectedValue The expected value of the alert.
080    * @param soft          Whether to perform a soft assertion.
081    * @return The current fluent service instance for method chaining.
082    */
083   public T validateValue(final AlertUiElement element, String expectedValue, boolean soft) {
084      Allure.step(String.format("[UI - Alert] Validating value for alert with componentType: %s, locator: %s",
085            element.componentType(), element.locator()));
086      element.before().accept(driver);
087      String value = alertService.getValue(element.componentType(), element.locator());
088      element.after().accept(driver);
089      storage.sub(UI).put(element.enumImpl(), value);
090      if (soft) {
091         return (T) uiServiceFluent.validate(
092               softAssertions -> softAssertions.assertThat(value).as("Validating Alert value")
093                     .isEqualTo(expectedValue));
094      } else {
095         return (T) uiServiceFluent.validate(
096               () -> Assertions.assertThat(value).as("Validating Alert value")
097                     .isEqualTo(expectedValue));
098      }
099   }
100
101   /**
102    * Checks if the specified alert element is visible.
103    *
104    * @param element The alert UI element.
105    * @return The current fluent service instance for method chaining.
106    */
107   public T isVisible(final AlertUiElement element) {
108      Allure.step(String.format("[UI - Alert] Checking visibility for alert with componentType: %s, locator: %s",
109            element.componentType(), element.locator()));
110      element.before().accept(driver);
111      boolean enabled = alertService.isVisible(element.componentType(), element.locator());
112      element.after().accept(driver);
113      storage.sub(UI).put(element.enumImpl(), enabled);
114      return uiServiceFluent;
115   }
116
117   /**
118    * Validates if the specified alert element is visible.
119    *
120    * @param element The alert UI element.
121    * @return The current fluent service instance for method chaining.
122    */
123   public T validateIsVisible(final AlertUiElement element) {
124      return validateIsVisible(element, true, false);
125   }
126
127   /**
128    * Validates if the specified alert element is visible with an option for soft assertions.
129    *
130    * @param element The alert UI element.
131    * @param soft    Whether to perform a soft assertion.
132    * @return The current fluent service instance for method chaining.
133    */
134   public T validateIsVisible(final AlertUiElement element, boolean soft) {
135      return validateIsVisible(element, true, soft);
136   }
137
138   /**
139    * Validates if the specified alert element is visible or hidden based on the provided flag.
140    *
141    * @param element         The alert UI element.
142    * @param shouldBeVisible Whether the element should be visible.
143    * @param soft            Whether to perform a soft assertion.
144    * @return The current fluent service instance for method chaining.
145    */
146   private T validateIsVisible(final AlertUiElement element, boolean shouldBeVisible, boolean soft) {
147      Allure.step(String.format("[UI - Alert] Validating visibility for alert with componentType: %s, locator: %s",
148            element.componentType(), element.locator()));
149      element.before().accept(driver);
150      boolean visible = alertService.isVisible(element.componentType(), element.locator());
151      element.after().accept(driver);
152      storage.sub(UI).put(element.enumImpl(), visible);
153
154      String assertionMessage = shouldBeVisible
155            ? "Validating Alert is visible"
156            : "Validating Alert is hidden";
157
158      if (soft) {
159         return (T) uiServiceFluent.validate(
160               softAssertions -> {
161                  if (shouldBeVisible) {
162                     softAssertions.assertThat(visible).as(assertionMessage).isTrue();
163                  } else {
164                     softAssertions.assertThat(visible).as(assertionMessage).isFalse();
165                  }
166               }
167         );
168      } else {
169         return (T) uiServiceFluent.validate(
170               () -> {
171                  if (shouldBeVisible) {
172                     Assertions.assertThat(visible).as(assertionMessage).isTrue();
173                  } else {
174                     Assertions.assertThat(visible).as(assertionMessage).isFalse();
175                  }
176               }
177         );
178      }
179   }
180
181   /**
182    * Validates if the specified alert element is hidden.
183    *
184    * @param element The alert UI element.
185    * @return The current fluent service instance for method chaining.
186    */
187   public T validateIsHidden(final AlertUiElement element) {
188      return validateIsVisible(element, false, false);
189   }
190
191   /**
192    * Validates if the specified alert element is hidden with an option for soft assertions.
193    *
194    * @param element The alert UI element.
195    * @param soft    Whether to perform a soft assertion.
196    * @return The current fluent service instance for method chaining.
197    */
198   public T validateIsHidden(final AlertUiElement element, boolean soft) {
199      return validateIsVisible(element, false, soft);
200   }
201}
